purchase_confirm_description: The title you have selected is available to view with alternate language audio and subtitles. Please choose your desired language options and press Confirm to begin playing your selection.
key_action_details: Press OK to view and order
kids_mode_description: Kid-Friendly browsing with movies suitable for families with children aged 13 and below.
adult_mode_description: The adult content section of GuestFlix is intended for adults only and may include content that some viewers may find offensive. If you are under the age of 18 (or majority in your area), or if you find this material offensive, please return to the main menu.
